text: Is it possible lock and unlock a dozen or more webpages at a time programmatically?

hello friends.  working on an update to the fields snippets for the vscode extension and wandering if it would be better to tab through each option in the field array or just the name, label and default values.  after using myself, i know that i want to tab to the default value at a minimum
for reference and if you aint using it, you should be <https://github.com/williamspiro/HubL-Language-Extension>
